sdoR2SmallClaimsJudgesRecital.input: Upon considering the statements of case and the information provided by the parties.

sdoR2SmallClaimsWitnessStatements.sdoStatementOfWitness: Each party must upload to the Digital Portal copies of all witness statements of the witnesses upon whose evidence they intend to rely at the hearing not less than 14 days before the hearing.

sdoR2SmallClaimsRestrictWitness.partyIsCountedAsWitnessTxt: For this limitation, a party is counted as a witness.

sdoR2SmallClaimsRestrictPages.witnessShouldNotMoreThanTxt: Each witness statement should be no more than
sdoR2SmallClaimsRestrictPages.fontDetails: pages of A4 (including exhibits). Statements should be double spaced using a font size of 12.

sdoR2SmallClaimsUploadDoc.sdoUploadOfDocumentsTxt: Each party must upload to the Digital Portal copies of all documents which they wish the court to consider when reaching its decision not less than 14 days before the hearing. The Court may refuse to consider any document which has not been uploaded to the Digital Portal by the above date.

value.label: Blackpool Family Court - The Law Courts, Civic Centre, Chapel Street - FY1 5RJ

list_items.label: Blackpool Family Court - The Law Courts, Civic Centre, Chapel Street - FY1 5RJ

sdoR2SmallClaimsBundleOfDocs.physicalBundlePartyTxt: The Claimant shall deliver to the court a physical copy of the court generated bundle no later than 10 days before the trial.

sdoR2SmallClaimsImpNotes.text: This order has been made without hearing. Each party has the right to apply to have this Order set aside or varied. Any such application must be received by the Court (together with the appropriate fee) by 4pm on
